title.narrative: Strategic planning and governance of GuangAn Federation

description.narrative: The GuangAn Federation of New Agriculture Entities (‘GuangAn Federation’) was established in March 2015. Up to now 13 primary cooperatives joined as members. Business activities of these coops include among others: production planting processing and marketing of rice and vegetables distribution of new rice and vegetable breeds and seeds mechanics technical and social services production of frog fish and lobster in rice paddies and agro-tourism. With a history of only 3 years GuangAn Federation is still in the phase of pioneering and developing its formal organisation. Logically the business activities of the GuangAn Federation are still very much project based. For the coming years GuangAn Federation will offer standardized strategic and marketing planning to enhance the selling and marketing power of the group. GuangAn Federation wants to organise one overall brand that all primary cooperatives can use. It also intends to raise the business cases for the individual primary cooperatives to a higher level by building ‘standardized systems’ that all primary cooperatives can apply. An example is the development of a standardized rice paddy system either a product for individual primary cooperatives or as a joint opportunity for primary cooperatives to invest in as a group (the activity will then be owned and organised on Federation level).
